channel.title: Books on Projects and Coding Adventures
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Projects and Coding Adventures

item.title: Coders at Work
item.description: A few days before leaving work for a week and a half of flying and cruising to escape frigid Pennsylvania, I came across a Joe Armstrong quote during my regularly scheduled slacking off on twitter and Hacker News. I’d come across a couple times before, only this time I noticed it had a source link. This led me to discovering (and shortly thereafter, buying) Peter Seibel’s “Coders at Work – Reflections on the Craft of Programming”. I loaded it onto my nook, and off I went.
